payload.name: ebpf
payload.title: eBPF: programmable measurement/enforcement close to substrate
payload.formal: attach programs at kernel hook points for observability and policy.
payload.apm2_mapping: eBPF is an ideal *observability amplifier* for APM2: you can measure per-tool syscall patterns, detect unexpected egress, and feed that into gates as receipts. Treat this as “hardware telemetry” for the governance controller.
